article_title: Oil Prices Rise on Ukraine Tensions
article_text:
Oil futures prices rose on Friday, after Ukraine said its artillery destroyed a large part of a column of armored vehicles seen entering Ukraine from Russia.

However, prices still posted losses for the week, as soft global demand pressured them down to multi-month lows.

The news from Ukraine sparked fears that tensions between the two countries could escalate further. Ukraine, backed by the West, has for some time accused...
